      • newSection

        public boolean newSection(String name)
        Check if a section is being changed - for SRT
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the process to be checked
        Returns:
        True if the names are the same

        public javafx.scene.control.ScrollPane refresh()
        Call before displaying this gantt chart
        Returns:
